name: Atlantic Graphics
duties: Standardised materials to reduce waste, increase discounts and improve job consistency

Account Manager's point of contact for any graphic related queries
Designed, prototyped and tested bespoke products
Projects include: Menu communication for 320 Sainsbury's Cafes & 70 Man-U Kiosks

name: Atlantic Shopfit
duties: Minimised project costs and enhanced value for money, while adhering to building & safety regulations
Preparing tender and contract documents, including bills of quantities

Procuring, preparing and analysing costings for tenders
Achieved accreditation from Altius and Safe Contractors

name: House of Fraser
duties: Responsibile for re-stocking, managing new merchandise and preparation of merchandise for the shop floor
Advised and assisted customers with any enquiries or problems

name: Sitel

Utilising up to nine software applications
Imperative to this role was an attitude of equanimity and understanding to best serve often anxious and stressed customers. (A flavour of gentle humour never went amiss either!)

name: Atlantic Graphics
duties: Supervised critical National Christmas M&S window-display order
Responsibility for all logistics and operational efficiency ensuring orders were completed correctly and on schedule
Managed nine temp staff, requiring leadership and problem solving skills, including: quality control, resource planning & management

name: Gilly Hicks
duties: Responsibility for re-stocking, managing new merchandise, preparation of clothes for shop floor

name: NHS Direct

This was a challenging post, which required acute attention to detail, discernment, clarity of thought, sustained focus and composure at all times

name: Debenhams
